snippet: Arsenal Manager Arsene Wenger said Saturday that he might want to keep Thierry Henry around until the end of February.
abstract: Arsenal Manager Arsene Wenger said Saturday that he might want to keep Thierry Henry around until the end of February.
lead_paragraph: The Red Bulls braintrust probably gagged on its corn flakes Saturday morning when Arsenal Manager Arsène Wenger said he may be interested in extending the loan of striker Thierry Henry until the end of February.

headline.main: Wenger May Want Henry to Stick Around
